mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_messages( id, question_id, order_id, title, type, message, time, user_id, user_name, receiver_id, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{questionId}, #{orderId}, #{title}, #{type}, #{message}, #{time}, #{user.id}, #{userName}, #{receiverId}, #{status} )
